title: Adaptive Card dialog
shortDescription: A declarative agent demonstrating how to open dialog boxes from Adaptive Cards in Microsoft 365 Copilot
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to open dialog boxes from Adaptive Cards in a Microsoft 365 Copilot declarative agent. Users can browse programming tutorials for Node.js, JavaScript, and Git, watch official Microsoft video tutorials embedded in dialog boxes, and take interactive quizzes with instant feedbackâ€”all within the Copilot interface. The sample showcases Action.OpenUrlDialog from Adaptive Cards v1.5, Azure Functions backend, and API Plugin integration.
